LanguageData.RawFungus.label: raw fungus
LanguageData.ZP_SoyBeen.label: Soy bean[ZP]
LanguageData.ZP_SoyBeen.description: Raw SoyBean。When cooking, soybeans can be treated as meat, though they can also be used to make Miso and soy sauce.
LanguageData.ZP_RawEdamame.label: Edamame
LanguageData.ZP_RawEdamame.description: Immature soybeans. As these beans have yet to mature properly, their nutritional value-as well as their preservability-is low; however, they can be a convenient meat substitute with how fast they grow.
LanguageData.WA_Azuki.label: Azuki
LanguageData.WA_Azuki.description: Raw Red beens.The seeds are used for sweet beans, sweets, candies, red rice and the like.
